title: Avenge the Ironhands
content:
Avenge the Ironhands Type Quest Act Act 3 Location Rivington Reward Gontr Mael Ironhands ally for Gather Your Allies

Avenge the Ironhands

Avenge the Ironhands is a Quest in Baldur's Gate 3. Avenge the Ironhands can be acquired during Act 3. Completing Quests allows players to learn more about the world and characters in Baldur's Gate 3, as well as earning more loot and experience to become more powerful.

Avenge the Ironhands Objectives

Meet the Ironhand Gnomes in Baldur's Gate. Follow the gn
